tier.tier-desc: The Cargo Flyer is Scholar Nielenoss's modified version of the Standish's Deluxe Cargo Disk. The Cargo Flyer has been specifically designed for use by Dragons, and wil not function for other races. It floats through the use of primal energies channeled through azulyte crystals and is quite sturdy in its construction and resiliency.

Originally designed by the Scholar Nielenoss, this cargo disk was inspired by the Gnomian Cargo Disks, but has been specifically designed for Dragons. It floats through the use of primal energies channeled through azulyte crystals and is quite sturdy in its construction and resiliency.
